original: Dahl, Karl Folke, fil. lic., bibliotekarie, Göteborg, f. 8/12/05 i Sthlm av byggniing. Frithiof D. o. Odga Peder-sen. G. 42 m. Kerstin Törnros. Barn: Feter f. 42, Svante 43, Sverker 47. — Fil kamtd. 32, fil. liic. 41 i Uppis. Amian. v. Gbgs stads bibi. 41, bibliot. där fr. 44. Skr.: Nya bidr. t. Holl. o. Frankr. äldsta tidn:hist. (Lychnos 38), Short-Title Catalogue of Engl. Coranto^s and Newsbooks 1620-1642 (The Libra-ry 38), Dutch Corantos 1618-1650. A Bibliography (The Hague 46) m. fl. samt ett flert. bibliogr. o. tidn :hist. art. i sv. o. utL. facktidskr. Led. av Hist. Genootschap i Utrecht.
translated: Dahl, Karl Folke, BA, MA, librarian, Gothenburg, born December 8th, 1905 in Stockholm to Frithiof D. and Odga Pedersen. He married Kerstin Törnros in 1942 and they had three children: Feter (born 1942), Svante (born 1943) and Sverker (born 1947). He received his BA in 1932 and his MA in 1941 from Uppsala University. He began working at the Gothenburg City Library in 1941 and became a librarian there in 1944. He has written several publications, including "New Contributions to the Oldest History of Holland and France" (Lychnos 38), "Short-Title Catalogue of English Corantos and Newsbooks 1620-1642" (The Library 38), and "Dutch Corantos 1618-1650: A Bibliography" (The Hague 46) among others. He has also written several articles on bibliography and historical topics in Swedish and foreign academic journals. He is a member of the Historical Society in Utrecht.

works.name: New Contributions to the Oldest History of Holland and France
